# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item is worth $1,500,000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality, innovation, and value. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000, a significant discount that we believe will be attractive and beneficial for both parties. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
